formatted_address: 1 Fusionopolis Wy, B2-03 One North Connexis, Singapore 138632
name: Cold Storage Fusionopolis

reviews.text: This store has turned from ok to bad and now to worse. The downward slope is more evident in recent months. The products is bad, you can’t find some upper scale products yet the prices keep high or even increased significantly. What’s even worse is it sold expired products. For example in the picture (taken on 25 Mar, 2025) it was selling product expired on 20 Mar, 2025. And the products were soaked in suspicious water leaking from the fridge. The store changed layout with no sense or taste. Many products are on the shelf without price tags. Eggs of different brands with similar packages are mixed on the same shelf making it difficult for consumers to choose. Staff are rude and lack of training (or received training on how to offend customers?) eg. When I was self checking out, one of the employees closely stood by me and watched me, and grabbed my receipt to check even without asking! I was astonished by this type of behaviour and realised she was not trying to assist but as a police watching a crime and catch a thief. Please go somewhere else for shopping!

Brought the honey roast chicken at Cold Storage @ One North today and was sold a spoilt old chicken. The meat have an awesome had already turned sour. The company & its management and staff should have moral responsibility, especially in their food and drinks quality management as selling spoilt food can cause its customer health issue.

Becareful when buying canned product. THEY Literally SELLS Expired CANNED product ON SHELF. Dont be a dumbass like me and bought the canned product without checking the expiration date. clown moment fr.When emailed the customer service, they take FOREVER to get back LOL (which by the way they havent). Maybe writing this review will get them to reply faster. Lolz.

5 star service. Was looking for celery and carrots and could only find the organic options. The service staff, Geok, volunteered and helped me find exactly the non-organic versions I was looking for and this was when I was already on my way and paying. Loved her enthusiasm and service level!
Not the first time pork is placed right atop halal items. Zero thought and consideration.

vicinity: 1 Fusionopolis Way, B2-03 One North Connexis
